title: Budgeting (NP)
brief_description: Shows the essentials of business budgeting, explains how to construct a budget and why it is such an important management tool. Provides clear and colourful graphics with animated sequences. Features John Cleese. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
